header.name: Shafqat Nadeem
header.title: Experienced Senior Flutter Engineer | Mobile, Android, iOS & Web Development | 6+ Years | 30+ Apps Deployed

about.title: Professional Summary
about.paragraph:
Experienced Senior Flutter Engineer with 6+ years of expertise in Flutter, Dart, Android, iOS, and Web development. Proficient in Firebase, AWS, GCP, S3, CloudFront, Cloud Functions, REST APIs, and GraphQL APIs. Solid knowledge of Python, Node.js, MySQL, and ELK Stack (Elastic Search). Familiar with Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and Selenium.

Developed over 30 mobile applications, helping businesses and startups scale successfully. Strong background in CI/CD, CodeMagic, Agile development, and DevOps practices.

Currently working at WithU Group (London, UK - Remote) since February 2023. Previously worked at CloudMedx (New York/New Jersey, US - Remote), TransData (Lahore), Absolute Solutions (Lahore, US & KSA), AllianceTech Pvt. Ltd (Lahore & UK), and Red Code Technologies (Lahore).

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from University of Sargodha, Lahore Campus (2015-2019).

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.pitch: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out. I'll try my best to get back to you! Let's collaborate on innovative AI-powered mobile applications and cutting-edge Flutter solutions.
